hero.title: Laundry Services for Home and Business
hero.subtitle: Pickup and delivery, drop-off wash and fold, self-service, and commercial programs.

overview.introduction: WeWash is built for busy households, short-term rentals, hospitality teams, and local businesses. Choose the service flow that fits your schedule and volume.
benefits: Live order updates and clear ETAs
Professional stain handling and garment sorting
Recurring plans for families and business accounts
Transparent pricing by weight, item, or contract

services.title: Wash & Fold
services.shortDescription: Everyday laundry by weight with folded delivery ready for closets or storage.
services.fullDescription: Our wash and fold process includes sorting by fabric and color, premium detergent options, low-heat drying rules, and quality checks before packing.
services.whatToExpect: Schedule pickup or drop off your bags. We process, fold, and return your order with an itemized summary.

services.title: Dry Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Professional care for suits, dresses, outerwear, and delicate fabrics.
services.fullDescription: From businesswear to special-event garments, our dry-cleaning workflow includes pre-spotting, fabric-safe solvents, pressing, and final inspection.
services.whatToExpect: Tag each item in your order, choose standard or rush turnaround, and track completion status.

services.title: Pickup & Delivery
services.shortDescription: Door-to-door laundry service with route-based scheduling across covered ZIP codes.
services.fullDescription: Book one-time or recurring pickups. Our route system groups windows by area to improve reliability and speed while keeping your preferred day/time profile.
services.whatToExpect: Choose a pickup window, share address details, and receive status updates through the order lifecycle.

services.title: Self-Service Reservations
services.shortDescription: Reserve machine blocks to reduce waiting during peak hours.
services.fullDescription: Self-service customers can reserve preferred machine slots in advance, improving throughput for families and high-volume weekend users.
services.whatToExpect: Select a date/time slot, confirm reservation, and check in at the counter on arrival.

services.title: Commercial Laundry Programs
services.shortDescription: Contract-ready plans for salons, gyms, restaurants, clinics, and short-term rentals.
services.fullDescription: Commercial accounts include SLA planning, pickup routes, volume pricing, and dedicated support for consistent weekly operations.
services.whatToExpect: Request a quote, confirm volume and turnaround goals, and launch with a tailored operating schedule.

faqs.question: What is your normal turnaround time?
faqs.answer: Most wash and fold orders are returned in 24-48 hours. Rush windows are available in select ZIP codes.

faqs.question: Can I mix wash-and-fold and dry-cleaning in one order?
faqs.answer: Yes. We split and process each category independently, then return them together unless you request separate deliveries.

faqs.question: Do you support recurring pickup schedules?
faqs.answer: Yes. Weekly and biweekly recurring plans are available for household and commercial customers.

faqs.question: How do commercial quotes work?
faqs.answer: We evaluate weekly volume, textile types, pickup cadence, and turnaround requirements, then provide a tiered quote.

cta.title: Need a custom laundry workflow?
cta.subtitle: Talk to our team about recurring schedules, service areas, and commercial account setup.
